attributes.action: Give us a referundum on whether we in Britain want in or out of the E.U. before 21/6/07
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have been promised a referendum by Labour on the E.U. and so should get one, before Tony Blair signs Britain away to the E.U. on the 21/6/07.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
